reviewText: niguem responde no fórum,
M​ixed reaction, Ron from Darden is very knowledgeable, but does not explain well enough and does not spend enough time to explain examples.

While the beginning of the course was really interesting, the overall quality dropped halfway through. The sessions didn't look very professional. It first touched base on some very basic topics and then randomly went onto very technical information. Very disappointed.

The case is interesting and beneficial in terms of helping to grasp the material, however, it would've been helpful to have something similar during the course with the answers and methodology in solving it.

Very useful and clear but only good to obtain interesting learning material - NOT for certificationPeer reviews not working. If peers do not review your assignment , you cannot validate the course. I completed the assignment very early and I had no means to make peers review it.ATTENTION: you can pay for the course and not be able to validate it only because peers do not review you assignment; and you have no control on that. Moreover, NO moderation on peer reviews resulting in low grading quality.

I loved the course, but if you want an overview of Pricing Strategy at least I missed it in the course! This course focuses on how to do the maths of price elasticity which is good and interesting too!
Excellent content but no communication at all with the staff; all questions posted in the forums remained unanswered.
Great course to start a journey into pricing optimization!

it is indeed a very beginning level. Remind me what I learned from CFA. The only downside about this course is that there are too many questions in the videos (compared to any other courses I've taken), I'd rather they all sum up in one long practice list, need to almost constantly click and click and click in each one of the recordings........too annoying.
Very helpful. The course provided conceptual insight in price setting methods apart from other relevant Technics and tools.
Concepts are well explained for each learner to understand, grasp the knowledge and apply the same in real business.
A very good first step into the world of pricing.
I liked the course, it was very useful though I believe some part should have been explained more. Overall, it was a  very good one.
Excellent course. In my view, the academic rigor of the week exercises needs to be improved even for a beginner level.

Good instructor/prof.  Material is a bit basic and some of the quiz and practice questions are less precise in the phrasing of question objectives than they could be but overall the material is informative and could be productively put into practice.
Introductory level, but a fun course !! Not very hands-on but still will add to your knowledge. Best Wishes.
very intersting course, learnt a lot
A good course but there were places where I felt things weren't clearly explained. Also, the quiz questions were sometimes somewhat ambiguous.
Technical stuff is quite elementary
Pretty good content, but would have liked the option to do more practice problems, particularly problems using formulas from the course and real world applications. Overall it was a valuable course.

an excellent course on pricing, taught by experienced practitioners, i found it very engaging and insightful over the course , few more cases and several in depth coverage over the material would give it a 5 star review. Great job by Darden and BCG, Worth the course fee.

The course is great. The last business case study was challenging and fun.Unfortunately, I met a learner who is irresponsible, marking my final business plan with a 0, whereas the other 2 learners marked 95%/100%.

T​his course is really high-level with great instructors, well-organized and structured videos including essencial materials. I recommend it to anyone who would like to gain additional knowledge in price strategy and market analysis.
The course is well planed and easy to absorb. The example is clear to understand plus, the formula is well used along side with real life example.
Good course to learn the basics of pricing
Professors explains every topic in a very clear and practical way. For a non-economics person like me, the course has a lot of value and encourages me to research more.

I'm so happy to take this class. Even though I'm a product manager, I didn't have confidence in pricing. Because  I did not major in business management. This is because I did not major in business administration, so I did not systematically know about pricing. This class gave me confidence in pricing. Thank you.
Good information and techniques of how to increases profits in sales companies specially for products and massive consumption goods.

Great course for everyone working in pricing with the basics that you need to know. Very well structured. I work in an industry with double marginalization and it was great to get some theoretical insights on it.
Very informative
Great course good for learning the basics of Pricing.
Excellent course with top lecturers. I really learned a lot about pricing approaches and strategies in this course thanks to the great lecturers!
Learned a lot about the basics of pricing! Great Course!!
Great course. Helped me understand how to price your product with respect to market prices in order to attract customers.
Nice course and everybody must pursue.
awesome content and learning!

This course is dense...loaded with terms...theory...examples. At the same time it is hugely interesting, makes you sit up and work out the problems. I hugely recommend this course for everyone related to buying and pricing.

Curso fantástico! Os professores têm pleno domínio e uma didática excelente, a organização do conteúdo é fluida, o conteúdo é bastante relevante e completo. Estou muito mais confiante no projeto que preciso realizar no trabalho aplicando os conceitos aprendidos aqui. Muito obrigada!

It was a tough course, but it is totally worth it. The way everything has been explained makes it easy to follow new concepts. You can rewatch till you don't understand things, and the examples given to depict application of concepts really make things easier.
Great with challenging case study.I review very different approaches and had  very different feedback for mine so I wish I had  some feedback from the Trainers.
it is a good course with a pretty cool explanations, the modules are so interesting and the knowledge can be applied in lots of markets and segments
Lots of practical and useful information that we can see in our day to day operations.
Thank you for this valuable course
Excellent content

This course gets straight to the essence of the core concepts and formulas of pricing strategy. Content and instructors are clear and the final project properly reflects the material covered in the course.
Its a challenging course, need lots of understanding and hands on to clear the course.  Had a great learning experience
Excellent, very complete and useful. Pretty sure I will be able to apply what I have learned here. Very well recommended.
Great learning even for novice learners, I am very impressed.
Challenging at times but full of detailed and valuable information. Loved it.
Great course to learn about the basics of pricing strategy, and some linear regression along the way.
Muy enriquecedor y despeja inquietudes sobre fijación de precios que en emprendimiento, lo cual es un punto clave.
Fabulous pricing insight for pricing innovation
A great refresher course that allowed me to get back into the pricing calculations with ease.  It can be challenging if you are not familiar with the statistical calculations.
Very Nice course, looks simplistic but makes a lot of difference towards the understanding...
Wonderful course. Really enjoyed learning!
This is an excellent course. Videos are reasonable length and have the essential content. Quantitative information is presented in a very palatable way.

An amazing course to learn more about price and the different methods of pricing.Moreover I also learnt how to apply what i learnt in theory in the practical world.Thank You Coursera for providing me the opportunity to learn so much from a course like this.

This is one of the best courses that i have done on Coursera. I hope my economics teacher was like Ron Wilcox. I definitely hope to complete the specialisation. BCG and Darden definitely stand up to their name and justify the place they hold in the student community.
INSIGHTFUL

Excellent course- as a marketing professional I appreciated being able to understand in better detail (conceptually and mathematically) the concepts that I've been applying broadly in pricing work in the real world. Adequately challenging and engaging!
It gives good insight with few concepts and easy calculations.
Awesome Course. Learned a Lot!!
Great content and delivery of key concepts
Well structured course to learn the price strategy with practical use case
It was very helpful
Very interesting and useful knowledge
Excellent course.
One of the most challenging courses I have done on this platform and yet one of the most rewarding ones. Can't wait to do the next one!
very good course! detailed, interesting and provides really useful concepts with real-world applications

Excellent course that gives insights into pricing strategies. The course was a combined package of theory and application in the form of case studies. Taking this course had definitely added value to my knowledge base. I thank the University of Virginia and BCG group for their efforts in modeling this course. Thank you Coursera of this opportunity!
One of the best courses. Thanks a lot :)
Provides a good understanding of the pricing concepts involved related to cost
nice content

I really liked the way course has been designed. Though I had microeconomics during my MBA, I am able to learn lot of new concepts in course. Some of the market phenomenon which I would not have been able to connect with pricing principles, now I can connect them after completing this course. Thanks to all instructors, Thanks University of Virginia and BCG!!

Really nice course with good mix of descriptive concepts, their calculation and execution in practice and case studies of companies. Control quizzes are really helpful to check own understanding. But please consider additional workload for final exam and assessment of 3 others. This is like an additional course week and should be mentioned.
good
This was a really well structured course, I was not expecting so much clarity on the content. Totally recommended.

Great course in terms of context and delivery with very knowledgeable staff. Overall, the videos are short and to the point and the fact that you often work with or are exposed to real-world case-studies is very valuable. The only negative for me has been the final assessment. I would be more comfortable with a more in-depth case study with more data to work with though I recognise this would also not be very practical. In its entirety, the course goes into depth without exhausting students. Quizzes are also challenging enough but not time-consuming to complete once you have revised the material for each question. I would also prefer links to more in-depth material for those who want to work beyond the confines of the curriculum (i.e. more info on how we derive to a demand function despite the topic being quite advanced). Highly recommended course if you intent to take the Pricing Strategy specialisation.
Highly recommended course 👍
Excellent course. Really enjoyed it throughout. Concepts are explained in a really nice manner.
interesting well prepared!
Fantastic course
Very helpful when making price decisions
It is excellent I learned a lot and acquired tools that I did not know and strategies that increased my horizons of thought on the subject
Good cases with strong background knowledge, the course provides a framework for me to reflect loads of real-world business problems.
excellent course and directly applicable for my current pricing job
I have gained good skills about price optimisation and this course is very helpful.
Amazing! price has been most of the time an uncertainty . This course gives you the learning you need for allocating pricing strategies to the right business scenario
Fantastic course with good inputs and material on fundamentals of pricing.
This course was well structured and the videos and assessments quite engaging.
Congratulations for the course. I could learn the pricing techniques in a easy way and star taking in daily use.
Is a good course that give you a large view abut pricing.

Even though there might be things I don't require for my job role/company, it's well put together and every new bit I learned helped me a lot to understand the business culture I'm currently in. Great course!
Excellent introduction to the mathematics behind cost and pricing strategies. This course gave me a lot of good information that I've already started putting into practice at work.

Clear course and teachers, challenging quizzes. Some interesting and advanced concepts (for instance on retail, bids). You need some  mathematical knowledge to pass (derivatives, algebra, statistics...) If you already have a business / marketing education, half of the concepts and methods won't be new to you.I would have like to have a bit more explanations for the final peer-graded exam. Also it can take some time (1-2 weeks) for 3 other students to grade your final assessment if not enough people follow the course at the moment.

I really loved the structure of this course. Lectures are very clear, additional questions help you memorize the material and focus on the most important things. This is the first course that provides lecture resources that are very useful to keep in mind the material you have learned. This course material is focused on the practical side, making it even better. Thanks for the knowledge, I will definitely use them in practice!
Really enjoyed the class. I would highly recommend this class to any business person.
All you need to understand about calculations and economics regarding pricing is explained, in detail, using clear examples and with great material to feel satisfied about complex information.
Really helpful and well-designed course for those interested in understanding the basic Pricing concepts in practice and learn how to approach any pricing challenge
The succinct and exhaustive account of pricing. Specifically, this course highlights the role of a firm's cost structure in pricing strategy.  Highly recommended!
An excellent course. A gold star online experience, fantastic teachers, albeit challenging in parts.

I'll definitely recommend this course as it gives you the basic structures to learn about the pricing fundamentals, like what cost and margin are and how to calculate them etc... it is also well explained, very thorough.
Good refresh, good learning of new concepts, excellent delivery of the lectures by both professors
Excellent overview of economics in pricing strategy.Great deal of practical work. Very applicable to real life scenarios.
Wonderful Course, with lot of insights and case studies.
An amazing content that allows me to understand serious companies pricing strategies.
Really useful course that I can recommend to every business managerExcellent professors
Amazing course, it takes us through details and specifics in the matter of pricing! I highly recommend!
Great course. Has good coverage of important concepts and is delivered very well. Really useful course for those with interest in strategic pricing.
Excellent!!!!
Great overview of main concepts, simple and immediately applicable explanation of elasticity and regression!
I loved the course, it is both a theoretical and applied sound program.
It was really helpful in increasing the understanding of different pricing strategy. It was really a nice course.
Great course. Strong theoretical base linked with practical exercises
Good Course
I would have loved if we were able to see a complete example, similar to the one we have done in the end of the course.
Concepts in this course are challenging but the class is setup for students to succeed. I really enjoyed this course and would recommend it to anyone looking to learn more about pricing strategy.
Very informative and practical
Even if you are familiar with the basics of microeconomics, and cost structures, this course combines it all together to provide a new perspective of using these models and concepts in pricing.
Excellent program. Well delivered and really interesting.
Interesting, Challenging and rewarding. Recommended for all pricing enthusiasts and professionals!
Good course on pricing...look forward to completing the rest of the three pending courses
excelent courses
Brilliantly led course. The BCG material seems a bit fluffy - but from practice I know it is important.

Excellent overview of Pricing strategy. The teaching quality is world class, concepts are clearly presented and explained, and the assessments are structured expertly to ensure an understanding of the course content.

Great refresher course on pricing and economics. Focuses on different pricing strategies (elasticity, pricing function, auctions, cost plus pricing, peak load pricing, index based pricing, marginal cost pricing, target cost plus pricing). Ron Wilcox and the BCG team does a great job in delivering lecture and keeping you engaged in the course.
ok
Excellent course and excellent material.
This is an insightful and educative course to prepare anyone for a pricing career.
Just superb. One of the best MOOCs ever.
Great Course, Thank you Darden and BCG!!
It's a very helpful course can improve my analyze skills whatever I'm a salesman or a buyer !!
Excellent Course for beginners.
Really nice course, well explained, and a lot of examples from actual cases!
Offers great conceptual clarity

I highly recommend this course. Thank you to professors for sharing the course material in such a sincere way. Course is very well designed. I did not have background in pricing prior to this course. This course definitely made me interested in learning more on pricing strategy optimization.
I would definitely recommend to anyone interested in pricing!
Course content was good, although it was simple, they can be made more rigorous.
Great course and intro to pricing strategy, already excited for the coming courses in the specialization.
Great Course!!
Interesting module considering this is my first time trying to understand pricing and how to set pricing. Learnt a lot, thanks.
Great course, with really insightfull topics.
Insightful course that provided a concise overview of pricing strategies.
